name: Coyaba Beach Resort

reviews.title: Paradise
reviews.text: I have stayed at this hotel on many many occassions and not once have i had any reason to fault it.

reviews.title: loved it and stayed healthy!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.text: The rooms are ALL beautifull - regardless of the type of room you go for you will find each room larger then any european hotel room - all furnishings are beautifull.

reviews.title: Great room, nice surroundings, away from the crowd
reviews.text: The beach and water is not the best but if thats the price you pay for being a 5 minute swim then so be it.

description: Coyaba Beach Resort is an intimate seaside hideaway directly on a private, calm beach. The resort offers 50 guestrooms, three restaurants, watersports, fitness, tennis, spa services, and the service & quality of a small luxury hotel. All rooms feature A/C, TV & VCR, private balcony, CD-radio, coffeemaker, hairdryer, mahogany furnishings, and choice of king bed or two doubles. Connecting rooms for families and handicap facilities available. Experience true Caribbean hospitality in an elegant beachfront setting.
